text: Nughedu San Nicolò (Nughèdu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 819 people lived there. Its area is 67.89 km². It is 577 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Nughedu San Nicolò
